# availableVideoCodecTypes

**Instance Property**

The video codecs that the output supports.

## Declaration

```swift
var availableVideoCodecTypes: [AVVideoCodecType] { get }
```

## Discussion

The value contains an array of video codecs that the output supports. Specify the codec it uses by setting a supported value for the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVVideoCodecKey] entry in its [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureVideoDataOutput/videoSettings] dictionary. The first format in the returned list is the most efficient output format.

## Retrieving supported video types

- **availableVideoPixelFormatTypes**: The video pixel formats the output supports.
- **availableVideoCodecTypesForAssetWriter(writingTo:)**: The video codecs that the output supports for writing video to the output file.
- **AVVideoCodecType**: A set of constants that describe the codecs the system supports for video capture.
